CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "Europe", "Neil Rowlands", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "ME", "Neil Rowlands", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "Africa", "Neil Rowlands", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "Europe SH", "Neil Rowlands", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "ME SH", "Neil Rowlands", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "Africa SH", "Neil Rowlands", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "India", "Behram Cooper", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "India SH", "Neil Rowlands", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "Asia", "Behram Cooper", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "Asia SH", "Neil Rowlands", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "NA", "James Nunn", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "House", "House", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "UAE", "Neil Rowlands", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "Intercompany", "Intercompany", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "UAE SH", "Tushar Nair", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "South Asia", "KJ Ananda", IF(TEXT(Region__c) = "Mara", "None", "")))))))))))))))))
